forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy. A steady rain this morning with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers for the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers this evening, then variable clouds overnight with more showers possible. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers early, then variable cloudiness overnight with still a chance of showers. Low 48F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 53F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 52F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early. Areas of fog developing after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High 62F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early then scattered thunderstorms developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning with scattered thunderstorms arriving in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
